title: Innovative Potential Estimates in Schrödinger Equations: Bridging Quantum Mechanics and Fluid Dynamics
content: This manuscript presents a novel approach to estimating the potential within Schr√∂dinger equations, with a particular focus on applications to the Navier-Stokes problem in fluid dynamics. By establishing new theoretical estimates, we delve into the intricate dynamics of fluid flow, aiming to unveil previously obscured aspects of the Navier-Stokes equations. Through a rigorous mathematical framework, we explore how these new potential estimates can provide a fresh perspective on fluid mechanics, contributing to the ongoing quest to solve some of its most persistent challenges.
